original_text: So, during the meal, he stood up. He took off the coat that he wore over his other clothes. He tied a piece of cloth round himself.
korean_text: 저녁 잡수시던 자리에서 일어나 겉옷을 벗고 수건을 가져다가 허리에 두르시고

sentences.original_text: So, during the meal, he stood up.
that he wore over his other clothes.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그가 다른 옷 위에 입고 있던 것이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: He tied a piece of cloth round himself.
